scripts.export: npx n8n export:workflow --backup --output ./project/workflows && npx n8n export:credentials --backup --output ./project/credentials
scripts.import: npx n8n import:credentials --separate --input ./project/credentials && npx n8n import:workflow --separate --input ./project/workflows
scripts.push: git init && dotenv cross-var git config user.email %REPO_PUSH_AUTHOR% && (dotenv cross-var git remote set-url origin %REPO_PUSH_URL% || dotenv cross-var git remote add origin %REPO_PUSH_URL%) && git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-generated commit' && git push --force --set-upstream origin main
